mapper.insert: replace into orders (orderId, sellerId, buyerId, orderStatus, firstTime, orderName, orderDescription, orderUploadTime) values ( #{orderId}, #{sellerId}, #{buyerId}, #{orderStatus}, #{firstTime}, #{orderName}, #{orderDescription}, #{orderUploadTime} )

replace into item (orderId, number, itemName, itemType, cost, process) values
( #{item.orderId}, #{item.number}, #{item.itemName}, #{item.itemType}, #{item.cost}, #{item.process} )
mapper.update: update item set process = #{process} where orderId = #{orderId} and itemName = #{itemName}
